lines.text: A thousand poets dreamed a thousand years, then you were born, my love.
Have you ever heard of Russian Roulette?
Why, certainly. I used to play it all the time with my father.
I doubt that you played Russian Roulette all the time with your father!
Oh, I most certainly did. You play it with two decks of cards, and...
That's Russian Bank. Russian Roulette's a very different amusement which I can only wish your father had played continuously before he had you!
You handle Handel like nobody handles Handel. And your Delius - delirious!
I don't think they should do this in public.
Well, it's better to do it in public than not to do it at all!
Well, August, what happy updraft wafts you hither?
Too much temperament. Give me the simple viewpoint!
You've got it, boy, you don't have to yearn for it.
if I don't regain control of myself in a few minutes, concert or no concert, I'll take this candelabrum and beat that walnut you use for a head into a nutburger, I believe they're called!
There's nothing wrong with me that a couple of magnums of Champagne won't cure!
You see, some men just naturally make you think of Brut champagne. With others you think of prune juice.
Oh, ho!
You have nothing to laugh at!
If she weren't my own sister I'd have name for her that...
A thousand poets dreamed a thousand years, and you were born, my love.
What fur are you going to wear, so I won't wear the same?

People said "What do you wanna hear that Limey for? What does he know about music? It takes an Eye-talian, a Russian or a Dutchman to bring it out good," but something inside of me said "Give the Limey a chance!" And I did! And am I glad I did!
